team.heading: Our Team
team.sectionHeading: get to know our team closer
team.desc: Get ready to forge meaningful connections and experience the expertise, passion, and collaborative spirit of our exceptional team as we go beyond the conventional client-agency relationship, working side by side to understand your unique vision, align our strategies, and co-create remarkable solutions that propel your business towards unmatched success.

team_members.name: Feed
team_members.about: Master in financial market @@ Onboard at StationF VC @@ Guiding the team with a strong strategic vision and a commitment to innovation. @@ Committed to fostering a community that empowers every single web3 user and enthusiasts alike @@ Alpha maxi @@ (He's the one who will really give a definition to the word 'utility').

team_members.name: Halle
team_members.about: Full Stack & BlockChain Engineer @@ Over 9 years of experience @@ Expertise in both front-end and back-end development, creating seamless user experiences. @@ Pioneering blockchain solutions that transform industries and redefine possibilities. @@ (He's the one who's transforming your dream into reality)

team_members.name: Nxxn
team_members.about: 2 years in NFTs @@ Leading Alpha in the biggest projects on Solana (Jelly, GKD and more) @@ Bringing connections and useful contacts to push the best tech with strong united powers. @@ Advising about branding solutions to make sure that the utility is accompanied by great design and perfect marketing decisions. @@ Finding the balance between Feed's endless ideas and GetLow's denials.

team_members.name: Getlow
team_members.about: Core team member of Enigma ventures and Oracles @@ Expert guidance for NFT initiatives in the Web3 ecosystem @@ Collaborate seamlessly with developers, designers, and marketers @@ Bridge technical and non-technical aspects for project success @@ (He's the one making you bullish asf)

team_members.about: Master's in Petroleum Geology @@ Working full time Web3 since 2021 @@ Alpha provider and Thread writer @@ Excited about the endless possibilities that web3 can bring in the future @@ (He is the one you can ask for alpha)

team_members.about: 8 years of overall software development experience @@ 4 years of specific blockchain development experience @@ He has worked with several programming languages including Solidity, C++, Go, Rust and JavaScript and have rich development experience both front-end and back-end @@ He has great experience and skills as a full-stack developer and as a blockchain developer

team_members.about: Blockchain & Full Stack Develoepr @@ Over 7 years of experience @@ Love Solana.@@ (He is the gifted addition for your project.)

team_members.about: Graphics, motion, UI designer @@ Emphasising effective visual communication in designs. @@ Keen eye for aesthetics and user experience @@  Driven to use a blend of technical expertise and creativity to create impactful, practical designs. @@ (He's the one armed with a palette of hex codes and a canvas of pixels)

I've been working with companies including the museum of toys in Indonesia (MOT)

products.name: DAB
products.desc: The first Fractionalized Alpha Calling System that allows you to invest into any calls, whatever your portfolio is and get your return on investment. Both the alpha caller and the user are winners !

products.name: K-Lock
products.desc: A platform that includes 5 main keys for a healthy community. 25 seconds on -chain Verification, Real time sales bot, Whitelist collector, rarity check, and Data display aggregators.

products.name: Mikuko AIO
products.desc: An All-In-One software supporting 35 minting and sniping modules (Magic Eden, FFF token market, Cmv3 and much more) as well as a large range of wallet management features.

products.name: Burnooor
products.desc: We allow project to customise their own burning mechanism. Users can compete for rewards and bragging rights. Use it to mint a new collection, make an art revamp, burn and freeze your NFTs and much more !

products.name: Questoor
products.desc: The ultimate organic engagement platform: set your quest (we're supporting discord and twitter API) like RT, Like a tweet, follow an account, write a thread, react to a discord announcement

products.name: The Shop
products.desc: Ever wondered if our SPLs has real utility? The shop helps in setting your products up and integrating SPL to purchase WL, NFTs and much more with your native project token !

products.name: Realm
products.desc: Realm is the first anti-bot raffle whitelist platform that allows founders and CMs to choose who, how, and when is eligible to grab your WL and engage. Omitting all bots through our top-notch algorithm and IP detections
